mapper.select: select * from tt_board ORDER BY regdate desc;

SELECT b.bno, b.title, b.content, b.writer_uid, b.regdate, b.recommend, b.hits FROM ( SELECT @rownum := @rownum +1 AS rownum, pentacore.tt_board.* FROM pentacore.tt_board, (SELECT @rownum := 0) bno ORDER BY pentacore.tt_board.regdate DESC ) b WHERE rownum between #{start } and #{end }
mapper.update: UPDATE pentacore.tt_board SET title = #{title }, content = #{content} WHERE bno = #{bno};
